definition: instrumentality that combines interrelated interacting artifacts designed to work as a coherent entity
details:
noun
- instrumentality that combines interrelated interacting artifacts designed to work as a coherent entity
= example: instrumentality that combines interrelated interacting artifacts designed to work as a coherent entity
- an ordered manner
= synonyms: organization, organisation
- the living body considered as made up of interdependent components forming a unified whole
= example: the living body considered as made up of interdependent components forming a unified whole
- a group of physiologically or anatomically related organs or parts
= example: a group of physiologically or anatomically related organs or parts
- a complex of methods or rules governing behavior
= example: a complex of methods or rules governing behavior
= synonyms: system of rules
- an organized structure for arranging or classifying
= synonyms: organization, organisation
- a procedure or process for obtaining an objective
= example: a procedure or process for obtaining an objective
- a group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole
= example: a group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole
= synonyms: scheme
- (physical chemistry) a sample of matter in which substances in different phases are in equilibrium
= example: (physical chemistry) a sample of matter in which substances in different phases are in equilibrium
